audioText: Avant-hier, Marie regardait là-dedans. Dorénavant, elle cherche ailleurs.
question: Listening: When did Marie look inside?
explanation: The text states 'Avant-hier, Marie regardait là-dedans. Dorénavant, elle cherche ailleurs.' - 'The day before yesterday, Marie was looking in there. From now on, she looks elsewhere.' The time reference is clearly 'avant-hier' (the day before yesterday).
